title: Golden Pearl Trading Corporation Recalls Ready to Eat Imported Siluriformes Products Produced Without Benefit of Import Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 24, 2020 – Golden Pearl Trading Corporation (doing business as Dandy Food Products), a San Lorenzo, Calif. establishment, is recalling approximately 12,054 pounds of ready-to-eat (RTE) imported Siluriformes products that were not presented for import re-inspection into the United States, the U.S. Department...
impacted_products: • 113-g. foil bags containing “Sugar Kid SALTED EGG FISH SKIN.”
